messages.subject: Newcomer
messages.msgSnippet: I am a newcomer to the list. I probably will read more than post unless I find some of my experience helpful to others. I homeschooled my oldest some 20 years
messages.messageBody:
I am a newcomer to the list. I probably will read more than post
unless I find some of my experience helpful to others. I homeschooled
my oldest some 20 years ago and recently have been homeschooling my
youngest my 17 year old who is now dual enrolled in the local
community school. I was excited to find a support group online such
as this.

My 22 year old daugher is expecting my first grandchild any day and
wants my assistance in homeschooling her as well. So the postings
here will be most helpful as so much has changed!

Sincerely,

Katie
